# data loda

```{r dataloda}
cbs31 <- read_dta("../data/cbs31.dta")
cbs31$income <- as.numeric(cbs31$income)
cbs31_occ <- cbs31 %>%
  select(.,SE22,occ,SEX,income) %>%
  filter(SE22 ==3)

cbs32 <- read_sav("../data/cbs32.sav", encoding="latin1")
cbs33 <- read_sav("../data/ABS3w.CN.sav")
abs3_cn <- read_sav("../data/ABS3 merge20210506.sav") %>%
  filter(country == 4)
```
